\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 41557}

\subsection*{Bunk Ass Crap}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Special K}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 3 bowls & smoked & Cannabis & plant material\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 3 bowls & smoked & Red Rock & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 195.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I decided to trade some nugs for some opium.  I had tried a tiny ass bit on a bowl with some of said nugs.  It was red and very different from the last time I got some (black O) a few years back.  Unfortunelately I was relying on my friend with the shit not to be a fuckin idiot.  Wasn't sure sbout it so decided to try more.  Got 4.8 grams.  Packed 3 bongs with a mix of nugs and burnt it all up.  I thought I felt some additional effects but wasn't sure.  Twenty minutes after smoking I read up online and found the articles on this fake ass shit.  Then I fully comprehended my situation.
